items.question: What customization options are available for avatars?
items.answer: You can customize facial features, hairstyles, clothing, and accessories to create a unique avatar that represents your brand. The interface is user-friendly, enabling easy adjustments based on your preferences.

items.question: How long does it take to generate an animated avatar?
items.answer: Typically, it takes just a few minutes to generate your animated avatar once all inputs are provided. The process is designed for speed without compromising quality.

items.question: Can I use the animated avatar in social media posts?
items.answer: Yes! Your animated avatars can be used across all social media platforms to enhance engagement and interaction with your audience.

items.question: What file formats are available for download?
items.answer: Avatars can be downloaded in various formats including MP4 for videos and GIF for lightweight animations suitable for quick sharing.

items.question: Do I need any design skills to create an avatar?
items.answer: Not at all! Our platform is designed for everyone, and requires no prior design skills. Simply follow the intuitive prompts to create your custom avatar.

items.question: What commercial rights do I obtain for the avatars?
items.answer: You will have full commercial rights to use the animated avatars for any purpose including marketing, branding, and personal projects without additional fees.

items.question: Can the avatars be animated in real-time for live events?
items.answer: Yes! Our technology allows for real-time animation, making your avatars suitable for live events, webinars, and online presentations.

items.question: Is there customer support available if I need help?
items.answer: Absolutely! We provide extensive customer support via email, chat, and a resource library filled with guides and tutorials for any assistance you may need.
